00108 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvHdrCellEvent : public wxNotifyEvent
00109 {
00110 public:
00111         wxAdvHdrCellEvent()
00112         : wxNotifyEvent()
00113         {
00114                 m_hdrCell = NULL;
00115                 m_x = -1;
00116                 m_y = -1;
00117                 m_control = false;
00118                 m_shift = false;
00119                 m_alt = false;
00120                 m_meta = false;
00121         }
00122 
00123         wxAdvHdrCellEvent(int id, wxEventType type, wxObject* obj,
00124                         wxAdvHdrCell *hdrCell, int x = -1, int y = -1,
00125                         bool control = false, bool shift = false, bool alt = false, bool meta = false);
00126 
00127 
00128         wxAdvHdrCell *GetHdrCell() { return m_hdrCell; }
00129         wxPoint     GetPosition() { return wxPoint( m_x, m_y ); }
00130         bool        ControlDown() { return m_control; }
00131         bool        MetaDown() { return m_meta; }
00132         bool        ShiftDown() { return m_shift; }
00133         bool        AltDown() { return m_alt; }
00134         bool        CmdDown()
00135         {
00136 #if defined(__WXMAC__) || defined(__WXCOCOA__)
00137                 return MetaDown();
00138 #else
00139                 return ControlDown();
00140 #endif
00141         }
00142 
00143         virtual wxEvent *Clone() const { return new wxAdvHdrCellEvent(*this); }
00144 
00145 protected:
00146         wxAdvHdrCell *m_hdrCell;
00147         int         m_x;
00148         int         m_y;
00149         bool        m_control;
00150         bool        m_meta;
00151         bool        m_shift;
00152         bool        m_alt;
00153 
00154         DECLARE_DYNAMIC_CLASS_NO_ASSIGN(wxAdvHdrCellEvent)
00155 };

00157 typedef void (wxEvtHandler::*wxAdvHdrCellEventFunction)(wxAdvHdrCellEvent &);

00159 #define wxAdvHdrCellEventHandler(func) \
00160     (wxObjectEventFunction)(wxEventFunction)wxStaticCastEvent(wxAdvHdrCellEventFunction, &func)

00162 #define wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(evt, id, fn) \
00163     wx__DECLARE_EVT1(wxEVT_ADVTABLE_ ## evt, id, wxAdvHdrCellEventHandler(fn))

00165 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_LEFT_CLICK(id, fn) wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(HDRCELL_LEFT_CLICK, id, fn)
00166 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_RIGHT_CLICK(id, fn) wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(HDRCELL_RIGHT_CLICK, id, fn)
00167 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_LEFT_DCLICK(id, fn) wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(HDRCELL_LEFT_DCLICK, id, fn)
00168 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_RIGHT_DCLICK(id, fn) wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(HDRCELL_RIGHT_DCLICK, id, fn)
00169 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_MOVE(id, fn) wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(HDRCELL_MOVE, id, fn)
00170 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_SIZE(id, fn) wx__DECLARE_ADVHDRCELLEVT(HDRCELL_SIZE, id, fn)

00173 #define EVT_ADVTABLE_HDRCELL_RIGHT_CLICK(fn) EVT_ADVTABLE_CMD_HDRCELL_RIGHT_CLICK(wxID_ANY, fn)

00182 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvCoord
00183 {
00184 public:
00185         wxAdvCoord()
00186         {
00187                 Unset();
00188         }
00189 
00190         virtual ~wxAdvCoord()
00191         {
00192         }
00193 
00197         void Set(size_t row, size_t col)
00198         {
00199                 m_row = row;
00200                 m_col = col;
00201         }
00202 
00203         void operator = (const wxAdvCoord &o)
00204         {
00205                 m_row = o.m_row;
00206                 m_col = o.m_col;
00207         }
00208 
00209         bool IsSet()
00210         {
00211                 return (m_row != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col != UNDEF_SIZE);
00212         }
00213 
00214         void Unset()
00215         {
00216                 m_row = UNDEF_SIZE;
00217                 m_col = UNDEF_SIZE;
00218         }
00219 
00220         bool Equal(size_t row, size_t col)
00221         {
00222                 return (m_row == row) && (m_col == col);
00223         }
00224 
00229         size_t Row()
00230         {
00231                 return m_row;
00232         }
00233 
00238         size_t Col()
00239         {
00240                 return m_col;
00241         }
00242 
00243 private:
00244         size_t m_row, m_col;
00245 };

00250 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvRange
00251 {
00252 public:
00253         wxAdvRange()
00254         {
00255                 Unset();
00256         }
00257 
00258         wxAdvRange(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00259         {
00260                 Set(row1, col1, row2, col2);
00261         }
00262 
00263         virtual ~wxAdvRange()
00264         {
00265         }
00266 
00272         void Set(size_t row, size_t col)
00273         {
00274                 m_row1 = row;
00275                 m_col1 = col;
00276                 m_row2 = row;
00277                 m_col2 = col;
00278         }
00279 
00280         void Set(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00281         {
00282                 m_row1 = row1;
00283                 m_col1 = col1;
00284                 m_row2 = row2;
00285                 m_col2 = col2;
00286         }
00287 
00288         void Unset()
00289         {
00290                 Set(UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE, UNDEF_SIZE);
00291         }
00292 
00297         bool IsSet()
00298         {
00299                 return (m_row1 != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col1 != UNDEF_SIZE) &&
00300                                 (m_row2 != UNDEF_SIZE) && (m_col2 != UNDEF_SIZE);
00301         }
00302 
00309         bool Contains(size_t row, size_t col)
00310         {
00311                 return (row >= TopRow() && row <= BottomRow()) &&
00312                                 (col >= LeftCol() && col <= RightCol());
00313         }
00314 
00318         bool IsSingleCell()
00319         {
00320                 return ((TopRow() == BottomRow()) &&
00321                                 (LeftCol() == RightCol()));
00322         }
00323 
00332         bool Equals(size_t row1, size_t col1, size_t row2, size_t col2)
00333         {
00334                 return (m_row1 == row1) && (m_col1 == col1)
00335                                 && (m_row2 == row2) && (m_col2 == col2);
00336         }
00337 
00338         void operator = (const wxAdvRange &o)
00339         {
00340                 m_row1 = o.m_row1;
00341                 m_col1 = o.m_col1;
00342                 m_row2 = o.m_row2;
00343                 m_col2 = o.m_col2;
00344         }
00345 
00346         size_t Row1()
00347         {
00348                 return m_row1;
00349         }
00350 
00351         size_t Row2()
00352         {
00353                 return m_row2;
00354         }
00355 
00356         size_t Col1()
00357         {
00358                 return m_col1;
00359         }
00360 
00361         size_t Col2()
00362         {
00363                 return m_col2;
00364         }
00365 
00366         size_t TopRow()
00367         {
00368                 return min(m_row1, m_row2);
00369         }
00370 
00371         size_t BottomRow()
00372         {
00373                 return max(m_row1, m_row2);
00374         }
00375 
00376         size_t LeftCol()
00377         {
00378                 return min(m_col1, m_col2);
00379         }
00380 
00381         size_t RightCol()
00382         {
00383                 return max(m_col1, m_col2);
00384         }
00385 
00386 private:
00387         size_t min(size_t a, size_t b)
00388         {
00389                 size_t m = wxMin(a, b);
00390                 if (m == UNDEF_SIZE) {
00391                         if (a != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00392                                 m = a;
00393                         }
00394                         else if (b != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00395                                 m = b;
00396                         }
00397                 }
00398                 return m;
00399         }
00400 
00401         size_t max(size_t a, size_t b)
00402         {
00403                 size_t m = wxMax(a, b);
00404                 if (m == UNDEF_SIZE) {
00405                         if (a != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00406                                 m = a;
00407                         }
00408                         else if (b != UNDEF_SIZE) {
00409                                 m = b;
00410                         }
00411                 }
00412                 return m;
00413         }
00414 
00415         size_t m_row1, m_col1;
00416         size_t m_row2, m_col2;
00417 };

01134 class WXDLLEXPORT wxAdvHdrCell
01135 {
01136         friend class wxAdvTable;
01137         friend class wxAdvDefaultHdrCellRenderer;
01138 
01139 public:
01140         static const int defaultSpacing;
01141         static const int defaultAlignVertical;
01142         static const int defaultAlignHorizontal;
01143 
01147         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxAdvHdrCell &o)
01148         {
01149                 // copy attributes
01150                 m_label = o.m_label;
01151                 m_size  = o.m_size;
01152                 m_alignVertical = o.m_alignVertical;
01153                 m_alignHorizontal = o.m_alignHorizontal;
01154                 m_spacing = o.m_spacing;
01155                 m_verticalText = o.m_verticalText;
01156                 m_sortable = o.m_sortable;
01157                 m_resizeAllowed = o.m_resizeAllowed;
01158 
01159                 m_minSize = o.m_minSize;
01160                 m_maxSize = o.m_maxSize;
01161 
01162                 if (o.m_renderer != NULL) {
01163                         m_renderer = o.m_renderer->Clone();
01164                 }
01165                 else {
01166                         m_renderer = NULL;
01167                 }
01168 
01169                 // copy internals
01170                 m_rc = o.m_rc;
01171                 m_decompIndex = o.m_decompIndex;
01172                 m_isRow = o.m_isRow;
01173                 m_parent = o.m_parent;
01174                 m_subIndex = o.m_subIndex;
01175 
01176                 m_table = o.m_table;
01177 
01178                 // copy subcells
01179                 m_subCells = o.m_subCells;
01180                 ReparentSubCells();
01181         }
01182 
01187         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxChar *label = wxT(""))
01188         {
01189                 m_label = label;
01190                 SetDefaults();
01191         }
01192 
01197         wxAdvHdrCell(const wxString &label)
01198         {
01199                 m_label = label;
01200                 SetDefaults();
01201         }
01202 
01203         virtual ~wxAdvHdrCell()
01204         {
01205                 wxDELETE(m_renderer);
01206         }
01207 
01213         wxAdvHdrCell &Sub(wxAdvHdrCell subHdrCell)
01214         {
01215                 subHdrCell.m_parent = this;
01216                 subHdrCell.m_isRow = m_isRow;
01217                 subHdrCell.m_subIndex = m_subCells.Count();
01218                 m_subCells.Add(subHdrCell);
01219                 return *this;
01220         }
01221 
01227         wxAdvHdrCell &Sub(const wxChar *label)
01228         {
01229                 return Sub(wxAdvHdrCell(label));
01230         }
01231 
01237         bool IsComposite()
01238         {
01239                 return m_subCells.Count() != 0;
01240         }
01241 
01248         wxAdvHdrCell &AlignVertical(int alignVertical)
01249         {
01250                 m_alignVertical = alignVertical;
01251                 return *this;
01252         }
01253 
01258         int AlignVertical()
01259         {
01260                 return m_alignVertical;
01261         }
01262 
01269         wxAdvHdrCell &AlignHorizontal(int alignHorizontal)
01270         {
01271                 m_alignHorizontal = alignHorizontal;
01272                 return *this;
01273         }
01274 
01279         int AlignHorizontal()
01280         {
01281                 return m_alignHorizontal;
01282         }
01283 
01289         wxAdvHdrCell &SetVerticalText(bool verticalText)
01290         {
01291                 m_verticalText = verticalText;
01292                 return *this;
01293         }
01294 
01299         wxAdvHdrCell &VerticalText()
01300         {
01301                 return SetVerticalText(true);
01302         }
01303 
01308         bool IsVerticalText()
01309         {
01310                 return m_verticalText;
01311         }
01312 
01319         wxAdvHdrCell &SetSortable(bool sortable)
01320         {
01321                 m_sortable = sortable;
01322                 return *this;
01323         }
01324 
01329         wxAdvHdrCell &Sortable()
01330         {
01331                 return SetSortable(true);
01332         }
01333 
01338         bool IsSortable()
01339         {
01340                 return m_sortable;
01341         }
01342 
01347         wxAdvHdrCell &ResizeAllowed()
01348         {
01349                 m_resizeAllowed = true;
01350                 return *this;
01351         }
01352 
01358         wxAdvHdrCell &Renderer(wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *renderer)
01359         {
01360                 wxREPLACE(m_renderer, renderer);
01361                 return *this;
01362         }
01363 
01368         wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *Renderer()
01369         {
01370                 return m_renderer;
01371         }
01372 
01378         wxAdvHdrCell &Spacing(wxCoord spacing)
01379         {
01380                 m_spacing = spacing;
01381                 return *this;
01382         }
01383 
01388         wxCoord Spacing()
01389         {
01390                 return m_spacing;
01391         }
01392 
01398         wxAdvHdrCell &Label(const wxString &label)
01399         {
01400                 m_label = label;
01401                 return *this;
01402         }
01403 
01408         const wxString &Label()
01409         {
01410                 return m_label;
01411         }
01412 
01419         wxAdvHdrCell &Size(wxCoord size)
01420         {
01421                 m_size = size;
01422                 return *this;
01423         }
01424 
01429         wxCoord Size()
01430         {
01431                 return m_size;
01432         }
01433 
01439         wxAdvHdrCell &MinSize(wxCoord minSize)
01440         {
01441                 m_minSize = minSize;
01442                 return *this;
01443         }
01444 
01449         wxCoord MinSize()
01450         {
01451                 return m_minSize;
01452         }
01453 
01459         wxAdvHdrCell &MaxSize(wxCoord maxSize)
01460         {
01461                 m_maxSize = maxSize;
01462                 return *this;
01463         }
01464 
01469         wxCoord MaxSize()
01470         {
01471                 return m_maxSize;
01472         }
01473 
01478         bool IsSubcell()
01479         {
01480                 return m_parent != NULL;
01481         }
01482 
01487         size_t GetSubCellCount()
01488         {
01489                 return m_subCells.Count();
01490         }
01491 
01497         wxAdvHdrCell *GetSubCell(size_t index)
01498         {
01499                 return &m_subCells[index];
01500         }
01501 
01506         wxSize CalcExtent(wxDC &dc)
01507         {
01508                 wxSize extent = dc.GetMultiLineTextExtent(m_label);
01509 
01510                 extent.IncBy(2 * m_spacing);
01511                 //extent.IncBy(2 * m_spacing + sortArrowSize);
01512 
01513                 if (m_verticalText) {
01514                         // rotate by 90 degrees
01515                         wxCoord tmp = extent.x;
01516                         extent.x = extent.y;
01517                         extent.y = tmp;
01518                 }
01519 
01520                 if (m_size != 0) {
01521                         if (m_isRow) {
01522                                 extent.SetHeight(m_size);
01523                         }
01524                         else {
01525                                 extent.SetWidth(m_size);
01526                         }
01527                 }
01528                 return extent;
01529         }
01530 
01536         size_t Layers()
01537         {
01538                 size_t layers = 1;
01539                 size_t maxSubLayers = IsComposite() ? 1 : 0;
01540 
01541                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(nsub, m_subCells) {
01542                         if (m_subCells[nsub].IsComposite()) {
01543                                 size_t subLayers = m_subCells[nsub].Layers();
01544                                 if (subLayers > maxSubLayers)
01545                                         maxSubLayers = subLayers;
01546                         }
01547                 }
01548                 return layers + maxSubLayers;
01549         }
01550 
01556         size_t GetDecompCellCount()
01557         {
01558                 size_t count = 0;
01559 
01560                 if (!IsComposite()) {
01561                         return 1;
01562                 }
01563 
01564                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01565                         count += m_subCells[n].GetDecompCellCount();
01566                 }
01567                 return count;
01568         }
01569 
01574         bool IsRow()
01575         {
01576                 return m_isRow;
01577         }
01578 
01584         size_t Index()
01585         {
01586                 return m_decompIndex;
01587         }
01588 
01589         bool IsRightEdge()
01590         {
01591                 return (RightSibling() == NULL); // if we have right sibling - cell is right edge
01592         }
01593 
01594         wxAdvHdrCell *RightSibling();
01595 
01602         static size_t GetDecompCellCount(wxAdvHdrCell *cells, size_t numCells);
01603 
01604 private:
01605         //
01606         // Internal functions.
01607         //
01608         void MarkAsRow()
01609         {
01610                 SetIsRowRecursive(true);
01611         }
01612 
01613         void MarkAsCol()
01614         {
01615                 SetIsRowRecursive(false);
01616         }
01617 
01618         void SetIsRowRecursive(bool isRow)
01619         {
01620                 m_isRow = isRow;
01621 
01622                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01623                         m_subCells[n].SetIsRowRecursive(isRow);
01624                 }
01625         }
01626 
01627         void SetDefaults()
01628         {
01629                 m_size = 0;
01630                 m_alignVertical = defaultAlignVertical;
01631                 m_alignHorizontal = defaultAlignHorizontal;
01632                 m_spacing = defaultSpacing;
01633                 m_verticalText = false;
01634                 m_sortable = false;
01635                 m_resizeAllowed = false;
01636 
01637                 m_renderer = NULL;
01638 
01639                 m_minSize = 0;
01640                 m_maxSize = (wxCoord) UNDEF_SIZE;
01641 
01642                 m_decompIndex = UNDEF_SIZE;
01643 
01644                 m_parent = NULL;
01645                 m_subIndex = UNDEF_SIZE;
01646 
01647                 m_table = NULL;
01648         }
01649 
01650         void ReparentSubCells()
01651         {
01652                 FOREACH_HDRCELL(n, m_subCells) {
01653                         m_subCells[n].m_parent = this;
01654 
01655                         m_subCells[n].ReparentSubCells();
01656                 }
01657         }
01658 
01663         void RemoveSubCell(size_t index)
01664         {
01665                 m_subCells.RemoveAt(index);
01666         }
01667 
01668 
01669         //
01670         // Variables.
01671         //
01672         wxAdvHdrCellArray m_subCells;
01673 
01674         wxString m_label;
01675         wxCoord m_size;
01676         wxCoord m_minSize;
01677         wxCoord m_maxSize;
01678 
01679         int m_alignVertical;
01680         int m_alignHorizontal;
01681 
01682         wxCoord m_spacing;
01683 
01684         bool m_verticalText;
01685 
01686         bool m_sortable;
01687         bool m_resizeAllowed;
01688 
01689         wxAdvHdrCellRenderer *m_renderer;
01690 
01691         wxAdvHdrCell *m_parent;
01692         size_t m_subIndex;
01693 
01694         //
01695         // used internally by wxAdvTable
01696         //
01697         // for wxAdvTable to store row/column position
01698         wxRect m_rc;
01699         size_t m_decompIndex;
01700         bool m_isRow;
01701 
01702         wxAdvTable *m_table;
01703 };
01704

02105         size_t MaxRow()
02106         {
02107                 size_t maxRow = GetDecompRowCount();
02108                 if (maxRow == 0) {
02109                         return 0;
02110                 }
02111                 return maxRow - 1;
02112         }
02113 
02118         size_t MaxCol()
02119         {
02120                 size_t maxCol = GetDecompColCount();
02121                 if (maxCol == 0) {
02122                         return 0;
02123                 }
02124                 return maxCol - 1;
02125         }

02634         {
02635                 return (size_t) wxClip((int) row + incr, 0, (int) MaxRow());
02636         }
